Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at  Jackson/Western
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Oakley, Van Buren, California & Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this  affect my trip?

#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Oakley, Van Buren, California, then resume their normal route on Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at  Belmont/Ottowa
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Harlem, Addison, Forest Preserve, Cumberland & Belmont, due to police activity near Belmont/Ottowa.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Harlem, Addison, Forest Preserve, Cumberland, then resume their normal route on Belmont, due to police activity near Belmont/Ottowa.

Allow extra travel time.
